ValidationRule.description: When the Assigned Product Line does not equal specific values, the TFS Linked checkbox should not be checkmarked. NICC-064390
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TFS_Linked__c = TRUE, TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "Connex", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "Daylight", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "Delphi", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "Delphi.fdc R Series", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "Delphi.fdc Winter Series", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "Delphi.Net", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "Diagrams", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "HotSOS", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "iPlan", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "I-Server", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "MeetingBroker", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "MeetingMatrix", TEXT( Assigned_Product_Line__c ) <> "NWS" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The TFS Linked checkbox needs to be unchecked in order to Save when using this Assigned Product Line.
